ingress: Here you can view recipes either sorted by area (coming soon!) or as a simple list from all across the city.
construction-header: We are working on this page, but tell us what you would like to find here!
construction-text: We think it could be nice to showcase the recipes uploaded by the Oslo Kokeboka visitors on this page, where we could sort the recipes by neighbourhood or self-assigned groups*. What other ways would you like to explore these recipes?
construction-asterix: *Self-assigned groups could be a group you make with friends, at work or sports club! You could potentially view all the recipes from these groups.
